Title: Enacts the New York religious land use and religious exercise act
Summary: Enacts the New York religious land use and religious exercise act prohibiting unreasonable restriction on regulations affecting religious land use or affecting religious exercise of institutionalized persons.
LawCode: Ren Art 10 §§100 & 101 to be Art 15 §§150 & 151, add Art 10 §§100 - 107, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to enacting the New York religious land use and religious exercise act
